pullrequest.title: Model submission for X4 sensor config 2

content.raw:
This mostly looks good to me. Can you make the following two changes?

1. rename ssci\_X4\_sensor\_config\_6.xacro to ssci\_**x**4\_sensor\_config\_**2**.xacro? 
2. apply [this patch](https://gist.github.com/iche033/8fff01f577c53da9b6511488cbdcc0d8) to model.sdf to keep the model consistent with recent changes made  to X4. It updates shadows settings and add color to the propellers.

‌
content.html:
This mostly looks good to me. Can you make the following two changes?

  1. rename ssci_X4_sensor_config_6.xacro to ssci_x4_sensor_config_2.xacro?
  2. apply this patch to model.sdf to keep the model consistent with recent changes made to X4. It updates shadows settings and add color to the propellers.
